security.getUser: select u.user_id, u.na_user, u.pa_user, u.profile_id, p.profile_de from public.user u inner join public.profile p on p.profile_id = u.profile_id where u.na_user = $1
security.insertUser: INSERT INTO public.user (na_user, pa_user, em_user, person_id, profile_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5) returning *
security.updateU: UPDATE public.user SET na_user = $1  WHERE user_id = $2;
security.updateP: UPDATE public.user SET pa_user = $1 WHERE user_id = $2;
security.updateUP: UPDATE public.user SET na_user = $1 , pa_user = $2 WHERE user_id = $3;
security.selectUserById: SELECT u.user_id, u.na_user, u.em_user, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.type_person_id FROM public.user u JOIN person p ON u.person_id = p.person_id WHERE u.user_id = $1;
security.selectUsers: SELECT u.user_id, u.na_user, u.em_user, p.na_person, p.ln_person, p.type_person_id FROM public.user u JOIN person p ON u.person_id = p.person_id ORDER BY u.user_id;
security.updateInstitution: UPDATE institution SET na_institucion = $1 WHERE institucion_id = $2;
security.selectInstitutions: SELECT institucion_id, na_institucion FROM institution ORDER BY institucion_id;
security.updatePosition: UPDATE position SET na_position = $1 WHERE position_id = $2;
security.selectPositions: SELECT position_id, na_position FROM position ORDER BY position_id;
security.updateProfile: UPDATE profile SET profile_de = $1 WHERE profile_id = $2;
security.selectProfiles: SELECT profile_id, profile_de FROM profile ORDER BY profile_id;
security.updateTypePerson: UPDATE type_person SET de_type_person = $1 WHERE type_person_id = $2;
security.selectTypePersons: SELECT type_person_id, de_type_person FROM type_person ORDER BY type_person_id;
security.updateEvent: UPDATE event SET na_event = $1 WHERE event_id = $2;
security.selectEvents: SELECT event_id, na_event FROM event ORDER BY event_id;
security.selectEventById: SELECT event_id, na_event FROM event WHERE event_id = $1;
security.insertPerson: INSERT INTO person (type_person_id, na_person, ln_person ) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) returning person_id;
security.updatePerson: UPDATE person SET na_person = $1, ln_person = $2, type_person_id = $3 WHERE person_id = $4;
security.selectPersons: SELECT p.person_id, p.na_person, p.ln_person, tp.de_type_person FROM person p JOIN type_person tp ON p.type_person_id = tp.type_person_id ORDER BY p.person_id;
security.selectPersonsByType: SELECT p.person_id, p.na_person, p.ln_person, tp.de_type_person FROM person p JOIN type_person tp ON p.type_person_id = tp.type_person_id WHERE tp.type_person_id = $1;
security.getAllPermission: select profile_de , de_action , de_endpoint  from permission_theory pt inner join profile p on p.profile_id = pt.profile_id inner join public.action a on a.action_id = pt.action_id inner join endpoint e on e.endpoint_id = pt.endpoint_id

sport.updatePlaceEventNameAndUbication: UPDATE place_event SET na_place_event = $1, ubi_place_event = $2 WHERE place_event_id = $3;
sport.updatePlaceEventNameOnly: UPDATE place_event SET na_place_event = $1 WHERE place_event_id = $2;
sport.updatePlaceEventUbicationOnly: UPDATE place_event SET ubi_place_event = $1 WHERE place_event_id = $2;
sport.selectPlaceEvents: SELECT place_event_id, na_place_event, ubi_place_event FROM place_event ORDER BY place_event_id;
sport.updateSportBoth: UPDATE sport SET na_sport = $1, de_sport = $2 WHERE sport_id = $3;
sport.updateSportNameOnly: UPDATE sport SET na_sport = $1 WHERE sport_id = $2;
sport.updateSportDescriptionOnly: UPDATE sport SET de_sport = $1 WHERE sport_id = $2;
sport.selectSports: SELECT sport_id, na_sport, de_sport FROM sport ORDER BY sport_id;
sport.updateTypeCompetition: UPDATE type_competition SET sport_id = $1, na_type_comp = $2 WHERE type_comp_id = $3;
sport.selectTypeCompetition: SELECT tc.type_comp_id, tc.sport_id, tc.na_type_comp, s.na_sport FROM type_competition tc join sport s on tc.sport_id = s.sport_id ORDER BY type_comp_id;
sport.selectTypeCompetitionBySport: SELECT tc.type_comp_id, tc.sport_id, tc.na_type_comp, s.na_sport FROM type_competition tc join sport s on tc.sport_id = s.sport_id WHERE tc.sport_id = $1 ORDER BY type_comp_id;
sport.insertTypeLineUp: INSERT INTO type_line_up (de_line_up, na_line_up, sport_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3);
sport.updateTypeLineUp: UPDATE type_line_up SET de_line_up = $1, na_line_up = $2, sport_id = $3 WHERE type_line_up_id = $4;
sport.selectTypeLineUp: SELECT tp.type_line_up_id, tp.de_line_up, tp.na_line_up, tp.sport_id, s.na_sport FROM type_line_up tp join sport s on tp.sport_id= s.sport_id ORDER BY tp.type_line_up_id;
sport.selectTypeLineUpBySport: SELECT tp.type_line_up_id, tp.de_line_up, tp.na_line_up, tp.sport_id, s.na_sport FROM type_line_up tp join sport s on tp.sport_id= s.sport_id WHERE tp.sport_id = $1 ORDER BY tp.type_line_up_id;
sport.insertTeam: INSERT INTO team (na_team, sport_id, institution_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3);
sport.updateTeam: UPDATE team SET na_team = $1, sport_id = $2, institution_id = $3 WHERE team_id = $4;
sport.selectTeams: SELECT t.team_id, t.na_team, t.sport_id, s.na_sport, t.institution_id, i.na_institucion FROM team t JOIN sport s ON t.sport_id = s.sport_id JOIN institution i ON t.institution_id = i.institucion_id ORDER BY t.team_id;
sport.selectTeamsBySportAndInst: SELECT t.team_id, t.na_team, t.sport_id, s.na_sport, t.institution_id, i.na_institucion FROM team t JOIN sport s ON t.sport_id = s.sport_id JOIN institution i ON t.institution_id = i.institucion_id WHERE ($1::int IS NULL OR t.sport_id = $1) AND ($2::int IS NULL or t.institution_id=$2);
sport.insertTeamMember: INSERT INTO team_member (team_id, person_id, num_team_member) VALUES ($1, $2, $3);
sport.updateTeamMember: UPDATE team_member SET team_id = $1, num_team_member = $2 WHERE team_member_id = $3;
sport.selectTeamMembers: SELECT t.team_member_id, t.team_id, tm.na_team, t.person_id, p.na_person, p.ln_person, t.num_team_member FROM team_member t join team tm on t.team_id = tm.team_id join person p on p.person_id = t.person_id ORDER BY team_member_id;
sport.selectTeamMembersByTeam: SELECT t.team_member_id, t.team_id, tm.na_team, t.person_id, p.na_person, p.ln_person, t.num_team_member FROM team_member t join team tm on t.team_id = tm.team_id join person p on p.person_id = t.person_id WHERE t.team_id = $1 ORDER BY team_member_id;
sport.insertCompetition: INSERT INTO competition (event_id, place_event_id, type_comp_id, date_competition, hour_competition) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5);
sport.updateCompetition: UPDATE competition SET   event_id = $1, place_event_id =$2, type_comp_id = $3, date_competition = $4, hour_competition = $5  WHERE comp_id = $6;
sport.selectCompetitions: SELECT c.comp_id, c.date_competition, c.hour_competition, tc.na_type_comp , e.na_event , pe.na_place_event FROM competition c JOIN type_competition tc ON c.type_comp_id = tc.type_comp_id JOIN event e ON c.event_id = e.event_id JOIN place_event pe ON c.place_event_id = pe.place_event_id ORDER BY c.comp_id;
sport.insertSportStatistic: INSERT INTO sport_statistic (statistic_concept_id, team_member_id, comp_id, statistic) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4);
sport.updateSportStatistic: UPDATE sport_statistic SET statistic_concept_id = $1, team_member_id = $2, comp_id = $3, statistic = $4 WHERE sport_statistic_id = $5;
sport.selectSportStatistics: SELECT ss.*, p.na_person, p.ln_person, scg.unit_meassure FROM sport_statistic ss JOIN team_member tm ON ss.team_member_id = tm.team_member_id JOIN person p ON tm.person_id = p.person_id JOIN statistic_concept_general scg ON ss.statistic_concept_id = scg.statistic_concept_id;
sport.selectSportStatisticsByTeamMember: SELECT ss.*, p.na_person, p.ln_person, scg.unit_meassure FROM sport_statistic ss JOIN team_member tm ON ss.team_member_id = tm.team_member_id JOIN person p ON tm.person_id = p.person_id JOIN statistic_concept_general scg ON ss.statistic_concept_id = scg.statistic_concept_id WHERE tm.team_member_id = $1;
sport.insertLineUp: INSERT INTO line_up (position_id, type_line_up_id, team_member_id, de_line_up, team_comp_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5);
sport.updateLineUp: UPDATE line_up SET position_id = $1, type_line_up_id = $2, team_member_id = $3, de_line_up = $4, team_comp_id = $5 WHERE line_up_id = $6;
sport.selectLineUps: SELECT lu.line_up_id,lu.de_line_up,lu.position_id,po.na_position ,lu.type_line_up_id,tl.na_line_up ,lu.team_member_id,p.na_person ,p.ln_person,lu.team_comp_id FROM line_up lu JOIN position po ON lu.position_id = po.position_id JOIN type_line_up tl ON lu.type_line_up_id = tl.type_line_up_id JOIN team_member tm ON lu.team_member_id = tm.team_member_id JOIN team_competition tc ON lu.team_comp_id = tc.team_comp_id JOIN person p on tm.person_id = p.person_id;
sport.selectLineUpsByType: SELECT lu.line_up_id,lu.de_line_up,lu.position_id,po.na_position ,lu.type_line_up_id,tl.na_line_up ,lu.team_member_id,p.na_person ,p.ln_person,lu.team_comp_id FROM line_up lu JOIN position po ON lu.position_id = po.position_id JOIN type_line_up tl ON lu.type_line_up_id = tl.type_line_up_id JOIN team_member tm ON lu.team_member_id = tm.team_member_id JOIN team_competition tc ON lu.team_comp_id = tc.team_comp_id JOIN person p on tm.person_id = p.person_id WHERE lu.type_line_up_id = $1;
sport.selectMeassure: select sc.sport_id, s.na_sport, sc.de_statistic_concept, sc.unit_meassure , sc.statistic_concept_id from statistic_concept_general sc join sport s on sc.sport_id = s.sport_id;
